solution.releaseNotes: * 0.9.2 - better error reporting in the mstest driver * 0.9.2 - started removing code contracts stuff because they don't report error messages the way i want * 0.9.2 - Renamed the Assert() method to be just another overload of Check() instead * 0.9.2 - Add the concept of context data including api methods for using It * 0.9.2 - updates to generic AreEqual and AreNotEqual to use object.Equals() for proper equality checking in case of anonymous types * 0.9.2 - new assertions nfor IsInstanceof() / IsNotInstanceOf() * 0.9.2 - add initial suite of assertions for collection types * 0.9.2 - new assertions for IsNull() / IsNotNull() * 0.9.2 - new assertions for IsTrue() / IsFalse() * 0.9.2 - new assertions for Throws() * 0.9.2 - add SoftAssertionTool * 0.9.2 - unit testing for assertion context code * 0.9.1 - add license files to nuget package * 0.9.0 - this is the initial release, and is a beta / alpha version with some incomplete / missing features
